hotels.title: Self-Contained The Reef at Atlantis Hideaway in The Bahamas with Private Beach
hotels.description: Tucked away on its very own stretch of pristine, white-sand beach opposite Nassau Harbour on the breathtakingly secluded Paradise Island, The Reef at Atlantis Paradise Island invites you to unplug completely - or plug into all that Atlantis has to offer. Surrounded by Atlantis’ six other resorts - each just a two-minute shuttle ride from one another - The Reef can be your self-contained sanctuary or your launchpad to the wonders of this perfect drop in the Caribbean Ocean. Choose a residential studio, a suite or a penthouse complete with laundry facilities and kitchenette, then find your ideal version of Atlantis. The foodies can savour coastal cuisine at Paranza or Mosaic's live cooking stations, while water-lovers can plunge into the Baths Colonnade’s pool framed by 2.5 acres of deck or the 2.7-million gallon Ruins Lagoon. Stretch out on Cove and Paradise beaches, then venture to Sip Sip by Chef Julie Lightbourn for a handcrafted cocktail.
